thought: The text extracted from the page contains a lot of error messages and warnings, which are often used on scam websites to scare users into thinking that their computer is infected with malware and that they need to purchase a product to fix it.
The page does not contain any hyperlinks, which is another common characteristic of scam websites. I now know the final answer True
